msg.name: apache_license
msg.desc: Text for apache license.

messagebundle.msg: Welcome. Before you launch into using Lonely Planet’s Trippy Application you need to read these terms as they govern your use of Lonely Planet’s Trippy Application.

msg.name: lp_copyright_head
msg.desc: Text for lonely planet copyright heading.

messagebundle.msg: How can I use my Trippy Application?

msg.name: lp_copyright
msg.desc: Text for lonely planet copyright.

messagebundle.msg:
You can only use your Lonely Planet Trippy Application for personal, non-commercial purposes.
Lonely Planet owns the intellectual property rights to the Lonely Planet Trippy Application, its contents and Lonely Planet’s trade marks. Except as permitted by this Agreement, Lonely Planet’s intellectual property may not be used in any way or for any purpose without Lonely Planet’s permission.
Of course, Lonely Planet would love you to tell your friends about how great your Lonely Planet’s Trippy Application is, but you can’t share it by forwarding or sending it to any person.

msg.name: should_rely
msg.desc: Should I rely on LP text

messagebundle.msg: Should I rely on Lonely Planet Content?

msg.name: license_aggreed
msg.desc: Text for agreed license.

messagebundle.msg:
We use reasonable care and skill to ensure the accuracy of the information we provide in the Lonely Planet content featured in Lonely Planet’s Trippy Application. However, we can’t always guarantee that the application will be error free or continuous.
We are responsible for loss suffered by you as a result of our breach of this contract if the loss was reasonably foreseeable by both you and us when this contract was entered into. We are not responsible for: (i) loss that was not reasonably foreseeable; (ii) loss that was not caused by our breach of contract or by our negligence; (iii) indirect or secondary loss that arises from the breach; (iv) losses that relate to a business (such as lost data, lost profits or business interruptions) that you or a third person is engaged in; (v) loss suffered by non-consumers; and (vi) any increase in loss that was caused by your breach of contract or your negligence.
Any legal issues arising from your use of the Trippy Application will be dealt with under the laws of Victoria, Australia.
